QuoteText: More from "Eternal Productions" Pure nonsense. The Bible also says that the earth is a circle resting on pillars. It also says that the earth has corners. Furthermore, it doesn't free-float in space. It orbits the sun. The Bible also says that the earth is fixed and immovable: 1 Chronicles 16:30: "He has fixed the earth firm, immovable." Psalm 93:1: "Thou hast fixed the earth immovable and firm ..." Psalm 96:10: "He has fixed the earth firm, immovable ..." Psalm 104:5: "Thou didst fix the earth on its foundation so that it never can be shaken." Isaiah 45:18: "...who made the earth and fashioned it, and himself fixed it fast..." Bible thumpers can't have it both ways. They will even twist what their own Bible says to justify a belief in their own mythology. See? Twisting what the Bible says to support mythology. The referenced verse says: "By faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God, so that the things which are seen were not made of things which are visible." Clearly, this means that the word of God is not visible. It doesn't mean atoms. That site is a laugh, Archy. One would have to be pretty mindless to actually think that it contained any scientific facts. The Bible isn't a book of science.
